short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Educate yourself on the political slant of news providers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nearly all media sources have a SLANT, known as a "media bias", or a lean to a certain side of the political spectrum. Whether this was purposeful or not, it is possible that the article you are reading is not necessarily what you wanted to read. This is where SLANTED steps in. Slanted is a browser extension designed to help you know the ideals of what you are about to read, but placing a recognizable color scheme in web browsers right next to the search result.
